name: Stuck (Kateouo)
description:
In this exploration game you can guide the seedling through an abstract mental plane, explore their negative feelings personified and traverse several spooky environments in an attempt to better understand yourself and maybe even grow. 

The controls are WASD or Arrows to move and Z, Space or Enter to interact.

This is a short game I made for my capstone project. I've never programed before so I apologize if you find any bugs or issues.

I Hope you enjoy this! I'm very proud of the work I managed to do :)
